title: Riot plz ban boosting players
body: facing many boosting players in my friends list. plz ban them like ID [Removed]

replies.body:
I've removed the Summoner Name you included in your post. The Boards is not the appropriate place to report other players. If you have information on other players breaking the rules, please submit them in a ticket to Riot Games Player Support where they can investigate the issue further. 

https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new

Thanks.
